original_text:
and cried out as they saw the smoke of her burning,
“What city was like the great city?”
korean_text: 그가 불타는 연기를 보고 외쳐 이르되 이 큰 성과 같은 성이 어디 있느냐 하며

sentences.original_text: as they saw the smoke of her burning
“What city was like the great city?”
sentences.korean_translation: “이 위대한 도시와 같은 도시가 어디 있었는가?”
